allow: Bash(# Check synced leads count for Copytalent curl -s ""https://abkamgmjmqzvdwtrkgqe.supabase.co/rest/v1/synced_leads?select=email,interest_status,lead_status&client_id=eq.5a4f22d6-b665-4662-aa81-d2d881dded22&limit=5"" \\ -H ""apikey: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Prefer: count=exact"" -D -)

Bash(# Check positive leads specifically curl -s ""https://abkamgmjmqzvdwtrkgqe.supabase.co/rest/v1/synced_leads?select=email,interest_status,first_name,last_name,company_name&client_id=eq.5a4f22d6-b665-4662-aa81-d2d881dded22&interest_status=eq.positive"" \\ -H ""apikey: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Prefer: count=exact"" -D -)

Bash(# Check ALL synced leads - any client curl -s ""https://abkamgmjmqzvdwtrkgqe.supabase.co/rest/v1/synced_leads?select=client_id,email,interest_status,lead_status&limit=5"" \\ -H ""apikey: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImFia2FtZ21qbXF6dmR3dHJrZ3FlIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTE4NTA4NywiZXhwIjoyMDg2NzYxMDg3fQ.GNDzbQJCfz-D7F5aPUQyPjP7V-rm-61Yls7vofwLBYI"" \\ -H ""Prefer: count=exact"" -D -)

Bash(# Fetch leads directly from Instantly API to see the data structure curl -s -X POST ""https://api.instantly.ai/api/v2/leads/list"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer M2Y3OTE0NGQtZTY2MS00MTk5LThhYjAtZWE3YjM5MWRlYjdkOllMZVZRZUFuZkpjRQ=="" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""campaign_id"":""a3a6fd64-c1b5-4373-ac7c-f455644aeb31"",""limit"":3}'' 2>&1 | python3 -m json.tool)

Bash(# Fetch leads with interest_status filter to see what''s available curl -s -X POST ""https://api.instantly.ai/api/v2/leads/list"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer M2Y3OTE0NGQtZTY2MS00MTk5LThhYjAtZWE3YjM5MWRlYjdkOllMZVZRZUFuZkpjRQ=="" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""campaign_id"":""a3a6fd64-c1b5-4373-ac7c-f455644aeb31"",""limit"":3,""interest_status"":""interested""}'' 2>&1 | python3 -m json.tool)
